name: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
title: Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning
desc: Praise be unto the Abyss, the Wisdom of Corrosion.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Abyss Lector: Violet Lightning

skills.name: Shock of the Enigmatic Abyss
skills.desc: Deals 3 Electro DMG. If the target is already affected by Electro, steal 1 Energy from them. (If this character's Energy is already full, then the stolen Energy will be given to the next character who does not have full Energy)

skills.name: Wild Thunderburst
skills.desc: Deals 3 Electro DMG. If the target has no more than 1 Energy, deals +2 DMG.

skills.name: Electric Rebirth
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Electric Rebirth.
